mapper.insert: insert into app_heuristic_result(heuristic_class, heuristic_name, severity_id, score, result_id) values(#{heuristicClass},#{heuristicName},#{severityId},#{score},#{appId}) on duplicate key update heuristic_class=#{heuristicClass}, heuristic_name=#{heuristicName}, severity_id=#{severityId}, score=#{score}, result_id=#{resultId}
